remarks: Inference that has ~ ax-11 (without ` A. y ` ) as its conclusion and doesn't require ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , or ~ ax-12 for its proof.  The hypotheses may be eliminable without one or more of these axioms in special cases.  Proof similar to Lemma 16 of [Tarski] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2008.)
